Package net.demilich.metastone.game.events

Events correspond to things that happen inside the game that other rules can react to.
See Also:
for the method where events are fired., for the base class of all events., for the interface that defines how things react to events., for how effects in response to events are evaluated.
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    HasCard  
    HasValue  
    HasVictim  
    Notification
    Represents a general notification from inside the GameLogic that the GameContext or players might be interested in.
